name: PenguinVania
description:
PenguinVania is a metroidvania / castlevania style platformer made for the Gosu Game Jam #2.

You follow the story of "Pengu Belmont" here to reconquer all land taken by the evil Chaos Penguin (previously seen in "Chaos Penguin", entry for the first Gosu Jam). Travel through different castle and fight him to reclaim back your territory!

It will works with Keyboard or Controller.

- X / Enter to validate

- C to go back or launch ice cube

- Space bar to jump

- Arrow keys for movements

Executable will run on Windows, but on Linux & Mac OS X you will need Ruby & Gosu installed on your device.
